subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: When the Jets hired Rex Ryan as coach, Ryan insisted that the Jets also hire two of his longtime friends and advisers, Mike Pettine and Dennis Thurman, for defensive coaching jobs.
snippet: When the Jets hired Rex Ryan as coach, Ryan insisted that the Jets also hire two of his longtime friends and advisers, Mike Pettine and Dennis Thurman, for defensive coaching jobs.
